plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Momentum to use your location to track your runs and show your position on the map.

plugins.healthSharePermission: Allow Momentum to read your health data to track distance, steps, and heart rate during your runs.
plugins.healthUpdatePermission: Allow Momentum to save workout data to HealthKit.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allow Momentum to use your location to track your runs and show your position on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Allow Momentum to use your location to track your runs and show your position on the map.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Allow Momentum to read your health data to track distance, steps, and heart rate during your runs.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Allow Momentum to save workout data to HealthKit.
